extendedInfo.description: Gain a mastery of French!French Class contains a complete offline French course, offering both written content and audio, together with interactive verb, vocabulary, grammar and listening exercises.Great support when you learn French. Easy to practice your verb conjugations, vocabulary,  grammar and phrases with.In this demo, only the first semester is available:â¨* Tenses: Present, Gerund, Participle* 300 words* Basic grammar* 30 useful phrasesAnd the following features:* Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises.â¨* Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made.The fun of this demo lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises. The full version comes with tons of content, while the content of this demo is rather limited.The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox.If you are serious about learning French, please give this demo a try.IMPORTANTWe believe in a long term strategy for this app and customer feedback is very important to us. If there is something you do not like, please contact us at our developer email instead of giving us a 1 star rating. If you give us a 1 star rating, we do not even get your details so we cannot contact you back to solve the problem. If you contact us with a remark or problem and we fail to help you within a few days/weeks, depending on the severity of the problem, we understand that you give us a bad rating.Also, if your audio sounds way off, please read http://www.ceardannan.com/products/android-language-classes-text-to-speech.PLANNED UPDATES* Writing exercises: the word, verb and grammar exercises will get a âwritingâ instead of multiple choice option, which will present the user with a textbox to type in instead of the multiple choice questions, for a bit more of a challenge.â¨* Image exercises, such as on clock times.* Making it possible to add your own words and phrases to the app through http://www.languageshq.com.

reviews.title: WARNING!!! WRONG PRONUNCIATION! FIX IT!  DON\'T LEARN from it!
reviews.comment: It pronounces the punctuation signs! Such as apostrophe or \"-\" (it says moins, which means minus in french) which is apsurd! The \"-\" isn\'t supposed to be pronounced at all! It is there to mark inversion. Horrible! Because of this it gets wrong liaisons in 70% of cases, and teaches the beginners something that is NOT FRENCH!  FIX IT PLEASE!! IT\'S A HAZZARD!  Edit: Apparently it depends on your device whether the punctuation is pronounced or not. And the grammar part is rather simpflied, but still ok.
reviews.author: tihana f

reviews.comment: This is an excellent app for french learners but plz impove one thing in this that is listening..in this app i want to listen every word without any support of any other app..otherwise its just too good..\tExcellent

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I have been studying French for years and I like this little app. Audio works great for me. But the app could be improved here and there..

reviews.title: Best language app
reviews.comment: Most comprehensive language app I\'ve found yet. Wish the graphics were less trite. The cartoon teacher looks like a Bratz doll.

reviews.title: Honestly, do not install.
reviews.comment: I\'ve studied French for a few years and just wanted to test this app out. Most of the people commenting here are beginners, so they can\'t understand whats wrong. The pronounciation of words in the app is HORRENDOUS. Sounds like something a non french speaker might blurt out when asked to read French. Do not install.
reviews.author: Malvika Patil
